0.4.name: wordpress/creative-commons-license-widget
0.4.description:
Adds a sidebar widget to display creative commons license:

Four languages: * English * Spanish * Italian * Catalan

All creative commons licenses: * Attribution
* Attribution-NoDerivs
* Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs
* Attribution-NonCommercial
* Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike
* Attribution-ShareAlike

Three images types * somerights20 * 80x15 * 88x31
